block.soup_barrel.alert.barrel_enough_ef: Suspicious Stew already contains enough effects!
block.soup_barrel.alert.item_enough_effe: Suspicious Stew in hand contains too many effects!
modmenu.summaryTranslation.soupdup: Storage soups and mixing suspicious stew
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.soupdup:
Storage soups and mixing suspicious stew. e.g.: 
 • Can store up to 54 units of the same type of soup in Soup Barrel
 • Three various suspicious effects in one mixed suspicious stew
 • The duration of the suspicious effects can be increased by adding the redstone dust
